content: the main color chain 4 then slip_stitch into the first chain to create a ring chain 3 this counts as a double_crochet work 1 double_crochet into the ring *chain 2 then work 3 double crochets into the ring * repeat from the * two more times chain 2 and work 1 double_crochet into the ring slip_stitch into the top of the initial chain 3 you created you should end up with **four groups of three double crochets** ### round 2 repeat round slip_stitch into the next stitch slip_stitch into the corner stitch chain 3 this counts as a double_crochet work 1 double_crochet chain 2 place 2 double crochets in the same corner space this forms your first corner *now work 1 double_crochet in each stitch along the side until you reach the corner in the corner work 2 double crochets chain 2 and then 2 double crochets again * repeat from the * two more times work 1 double_crochet into each of the remaining stitches on the side slip_stitch to the beginning chain 3 you made to join the round ***repeat round 2 two more times *** # wrapping up **fasten_off and weave in tails ** **attach the trim color** by tying it to any stitch chain 1 work 1 single_crochet into the same stitch continue with one single_crochet into each stitch around ensuring to work 2 single crochets in each corner **fasten_off and weave in the tail ** *and that s it you re finished **
